title.value: Assessing the emergence time of SARS-CoV-2 zoonotic spillover
title.justification: The paper's title explicitly focuses on determining the timing of the SARS-CoV-2 zoonotic spillover event.
title.quote: Citation: Samson S, Lord É, Makarenkov V (2024) Assessing the emergence time of SARS-CoV-2 zoonotic spillover. PLoS ONE 19(4): e0301195.

extractions.description: The study investigates the timeline and evolutionary dynamics of the SARS-CoV-2 zoonotic spillover by analyzing genomic data from various coronavirus strains. Employing Bayesian phylogenetic models and multiple datasets, the paper aims to estimate the spillover and divergence times of SARS-CoV-2, providing insights into the virus's evolutionary history in connection to bats and pangolins.

type.justification: The research involves analyzing genomic datasets using empirical methods like Bayesian phylogenetic analysis to draw conclusions about the emergence time of SARS-CoV-2.
type.quote: Bayesian phylogenetic analysis was performed using multiple datasets...

name.justification: The paper focuses on the evolutionary analysis of SARS-CoV-2 and related coronaviruses, a topic central to the field of virology.
name.quote: Understanding the evolution of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) and its relationship to other coronaviruses...

name.justification: The study extensively applies Bayesian phylogenetic methods to analyze the evolutionary timeline of the SARS-CoV-2 spillover.
name.quote: Bayesian phylogenetic analysis was performed using multiple datasets...

name.justification: The paper concerns itself with the emergence and spread timeline of a pandemic virus, which is a core focus in epidemiology.
name.quote: Understanding the evolution of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2)... is crucial for preventing future virus outbreaks.

name.justification: The research employs Bayesian phylogenetic models to analyze divergence times and evolutionary relationships.
name.quote: Bayesian phylogenetic analysis was performed using multiple datasets, using strict and relaxed clock evolutionary models...

is_contributed.justification: The Bayesian phylogenetic model is not a novel contribution but a well-established method employed in the study.
is_contributed.quote: Bayesian phylogenetic analysis was performed using multiple datasets...

is_executed.justification: The study employs Bayesian phylogenetic models to analyze genetic data computationally.
is_executed.quote: Bayesian phylogenetic analysis was performed using multiple datasets...

is_compared.justification: Results from different Bayesian models (e.g., strict vs. relaxed clocks) are compared.
is_compared.quote: Marginal likelihood results for the three datasets...indicate a strong support in favor of the presence of a temporal structure in the data.

referenced_paper_title.value: Bayesian phylogenetic data integration using BEAST 1.10
referenced_paper_title.justification: BEAST 1.10 is a well-cited reference for conducting Bayesian phylogenetic analysis.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Bayesian evolutionary analysis by sampling trees. BMC Evolutionary Biology.

name.justification: The paper utilizes genomic sequences from SARS-CoV-2 as part of its analysis.
name.quote: The datasets used in this study are available on GitHub...

referenced_paper_title.value: Surveillance of SARS-CoV-2 at the Huanan Seafood Market
referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper references previous studies which likely include the SARS-CoV-2 genomic sequences used here.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Surveillance of SARS-CoV-2 at the Huanan Seafood Market.

name.justification: Genomes from bats and pangolins are used to establish evolutionary relationships with SARS-CoV-2.
name.quote: A phylogenetic analysis of various betacoronavirus strains of human and non-human mammalian hosts...

referenced_paper_title.value: Evolutionary origins of the SARS-CoV-2 sarbecovirus lineage responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced literature discusses evolutionary connections between bat, pangolin, and SARS-CoV-2 genomes.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Evolutionary origins of the SARS-CoV-2 sarbecovirus lineage responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic.

name.justification: The BEAST software is used for Bayesian evolutionary analysis in the research.
name.quote: The dates of the main speciation events in the phylogenies shown in Figs 3–5 were calculated using the BEAST v2.7.5 software.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced BEAST software is employed extensively for phylogenetic analysis.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Bayesian Evolutionary Analysis with BEAST. Cambridge University Press.

name.justification: TempEst software is utilized for root-to-tip regression analyses in the study.
name.quote: Considering these datasets, we performed root-to-tip regressions using the TempEst software.

referenced_paper_title.value: Exploring the temporal structure of heterochronous sequences using TempEst
referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper references the use of TempEst for analyzing the temporal structure of datasets.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Exploring the temporal structure of heterochronous sequences using TempEst.
